issue.title: [Java][FlightRPC] Fix pom.xml for new flight-sql modules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15187](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15187). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
One of the CI pipelines is failing on the merge branch because of an extra <version> tag.
